definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: A lift your veil, once touched many hearts.
sentences.chinese: 一首掀起你的盖头来，曾打动了多少美好的心灵。

sentences.english: After a while, Pao-yu could wait no longer, so he stepped forward and removed the veil.
sentences.chinese: 又过了一会，宝玉实在按捺不住，上前揭了盖头。

sentences.english: She did not want to marry a man who simply wanted to marry a veiling , practicing Muslim.
sentences.chinese: 她不想嫁一个只想与戴盖头实践的穆斯林结婚的人。

sentences.english: In Christianity for example, nuns cannot show up without their hijab.
sentences.chinese: 就拿基督教来说吧，修女不能摘去她们的“盖头”。

sentences.english: This is later married with the red scarf of the origins of the spread so far.
sentences.chinese: 这就是后来结婚使用红盖头的来历，流传至今。

sentences.english: In Islam, the wearing of the 8)hijab , a head scarf, is a measure of a woman’s 9)conviction to God.
sentences.chinese: 伊斯兰女性佩戴盖头是衡量她们对真主的信念的标准。

sentences.english: I decided to start wearing the headscarf after about two years of soul searching.
sentences.chinese: 大约两年的精神探索之后我也决定了戴起盖头。

sentences.english: A sweet, creamy sugar paste used in candies and icings.
sentences.chinese: 彩色的糖珠，用作糖果和蛋糕的盖头。

sentences.english: You've had a bowl haircut at one point in your life.
sentences.chinese: 你一生中理过至少一次锅盖头。

sentences.english: What is it like filming the scenes in Jarhead?
sentences.chinese: 在锅盖头里拍这样的戏是什么样的呢？

definition: to push aside (clothing, curtain etc) to reveal something/to toss aside
ritual kneeling to heaven and earth by bride and groom in a old-fashioned wedding ceremony/same as 拜天地
